noun.description: A locust or grasshopper; specifically one of the family Acrididae.

adjective.description: Designating grasshoppers and locusts, specifically those of the family Acrididae; of or relating to this family.

origin: Mid 19th century; earliest use found in John Craig (fl. 1847). From scientific Latin Acrida, genus name or its etymon ancient Greek ἀκρίδ-, ἀκρίς locust + -ian.
